Author: Alpha-Sierra-Charlie

Comment: We have oil. We won't drill for it because of Obama and Biden regulations, but we have it. Expensive foreign oil is probably the only thing that could realistically leveraged to force democrats into accepting increased domestic oil production.   And now we've got access to Ukraine's mineral wealth *once the war is over*, which by itself is a big deal from an economic and security standpoint, and will also make us less dependent on China. Beyond that, rebuilding Ukraine is going to be big business and we'll be in a perfect position to benefit.
Author: Alpha-Sierra-Charlie
